tools.name: oneagent_memory_create
tools.description: Create new memory with real-time learning capability

tools.name: oneagent_memory_search
tools.description: Search OneAgent persistent memory system with semantic matching

memoryType.description: Type of memory to search (default: all)

tools.name: oneagent_enhanced_search
tools.description: Web search with quality filtering and Constitutional AI validation

qualityThreshold.description: Minimum quality score for results (0-100, default: 80)

tools.name: oneagent_web_search
tools.description: Web search with quality filtering and Constitutional AI validation

qualityThreshold.description: Minimum quality score for results (0-100, default: 80)

tools.name: oneagent_web_fetch
tools.description: Fetch and extract content from web pages with Constitutional AI validation

extractContent.description: Extract main content from HTML (default: true)

tools.name: oneagent_agent_coordinate
tools.description: Coordinate multiple OneAgent agents for complex task execution via NLACS

task.description: Task or goal for agent coordination

requiresBMAD.description: Whether task requires BMAD analysis (default: false)

tools.name: oneagent_conversation_retrieve
tools.description: Retrieve agent conversation history with full logging access

timeRangeHours.description: Time range in hours to search (optional)

maxResults.description: Maximum number of conversations to retrieve (default: 50)

tools.name: oneagent_conversation_search
tools.description: Search agent conversations by content and metadata with quality filtering

query.description: Search query for conversation content or metadata

timeRangeHours.description: Time range in hours to search (optional)

tools.name: oneagent_system_health
tools.description: Comprehensive OneAgent system health and performance metrics

tools.name: oneagent_context7_query
tools.description: Query documentation and context from various sources with Constitutional AI validation

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5)

tools.name: oneagent_context7_store
tools.description: Store documentation and context with Constitutional AI validation and quality scoring

qualityCheck.description: Perform quality validation before storing (default: true)

tools.name: oneagent_code_analyze
tools.description: Analyze code quality, patterns, security, and performance with Constitutional AI validation

filePath.description: Path to code file to analyze (optional if codeContent provided)

codeContent.description: Code content to analyze directly (optional if filePath provided)

analysisType.description: Type of analysis to perform (default: full)

storeResults.description: Store analysis results in memory for future reference (default: true)

tools.name: oneagent_ai_assistant
tools.description: AI-powered development assistance with context awareness and Constitutional AI validation

prompt.description: The question or request for AI assistance

taskType.description: Type of task for specialized assistance (default: general)

includeMemoryContext.description: Include relevant context from memory (default: true)

storeInteraction.description: Store the interaction in memory for future reference (default: true)

tools.name: oneagent_constitutional_validate
tools.description: Validate content against Constitutional AI principles

tools.name: oneagent_quality_score
tools.description: Generate quality score and improvement suggestions
